com.turnout.ws.service

Class PartyAuthMechServiceImplTest

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.turnout.ws.service.PartyAuthMechServiceImplTest

  • public class PartyAuthMechServiceImplTest
extends java.lang.Object
    This is a testing class for PartyAuthMechServiceImpl.So here, we mock that class to write test cases and validate generated output are same as expected for given input. All methods are mocking PartyAuthMechServiceImpl methods and it does not return any value.

    • Method Detail

      • setUp

        public void setUp()
           throws org.mockito.exceptions.base.MockitoException
        This method to be run before the Test method.So several tests need similar objects created before they can run.
        Throws:
        org.mockito.exceptions.base.MockitoException - It throws when runtime errors happens while testing.

      • testShouldResendCode

        public void testShouldResendCode()
                          throws java.text.ParseException
        This test case will test resendCode method. This method will test resending verification code to the user who requested it.
        Throws:
        java.text.ParseException - An exception occurs when you fail to parse a Object.

      • testShouldSignUpUser

        public void testShouldSignUpUser()
                          throws javax.mail.MessagingException,
                                 PartyExistException,
                                 java.text.ParseException
        This test case will test signUpUser method. This method will test a new users can sign up fiternity application. The users information provided by them will be store into database and send verification code to the respective user.
        Throws:
        javax.mail.MessagingException - It throws when the message content is empty.
        PartyExistException - It throws when entered party is already exist in database
        java.text.ParseException - An exception occurs when you fail to parse a Object.

      • testShouldVerifyEmail

        public void testShouldVerifyEmail()
                           throws WrongVerifyCodeException,
                                  PartyNotFoundException
        This test case will test verifyEmail method. This method will test that authentication of user by checking the verification code sent to their mail is equal to entered one.
        Throws:
        WrongVerifyCodeException - It throws when temporary verification code does not match with user's entered code.
        PartyNotFoundException - It throws when entered party is not found.

      • testShouldSignIn

        public void testShouldSignIn()
        This test case will test signIn method. The user need to enter their account credential to sign in.They can sign in when already signed up with fiternity application.

      • testShouldForgetPwd

        public void testShouldForgetPwd()
        This test case will test forgetPwd method. This method will test when a user can change their password when the forgot and use them as new login credentials.

      • testShouldResetPwd

        public void testShouldResetPwd()
        This test case will test resetPwd method. This method will test weather a user can update new password for their account.

      • testShouldSignupWithInstagram

        public void testShouldSignupWithInstagram()
                                   throws java.text.ParseException,
                                          com.mashape.unirest.http.exceptions.UnirestException,
                                          WrongAccessTokenException
        This test case will test resetPwd method. This method will test weather a user can sign up through instagram. Instagram user details will be stored into database and return it's id.
        Throws:
        java.text.ParseException - An exception occurs when you fail to parse a Object.
        com.mashape.unirest.http.exceptions.UnirestException - It throws when the http connection fails while getting instagram access token.
        WrongAccessTokenException - It throws when entered access token of instagram is wrong or not a valid one.
